commit.message:
Rollup merge of #85240 - Aaron1011:no-suggest-static, r=davidtwco

Don't suggest adding `'static` lifetime to arguments

Fixes #69350

This is almost always the wrong this to do

Rollup merge of #85240 - Aaron1011:no-suggest-static, r=davidtwco

Don't suggest adding `'static` lifetime to arguments

Fixes #69350

This is almost always the wrong this to do
